blogPost.excerpt:
Get a free trial of Wondershare Filmora: https://bit.ly/3vxQFDk
Join #FilmoraFest2021 to win a big prize: https://bit.ly/33Apw66

Today I tell the story of how my school found my channel while playing Minecraft Bedwars. Not only did my school find it, but other people did too.

Livestream highlights channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/PurpledLIVE
VODS channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/PurpledVODS
Texture pack: https://bit.ly/purpleddefaultpackv1
Twitter: @burpled and @purpled_alt

Current subscriber count: 982,000

Purpled Minecraft Solo Bedwars on Hypixel is HILARIOUS!!! Not really this time though I just had a little story time moment and moved on with things. I am on the Dream SMP and have lore now but that will come later. I literally edited this from about 11am to 7am (20 hours) because I forgot to get it done and decided to subtitle the whole thing and I am also incredibly inefficient at subtitling. This might be the last video I post before reaching 1,000,000 subscribers which is absolutely insane... thank you all for watching!

How EVERYONE Found My Channel

#bedwars #minecraft
blogPost.body:
Get a free trial of Wondershare Filmora: https://bit.ly/3vxQFDk
Join #FilmoraFest2021 to win a big prize: https://bit.ly/33Apw66

Today I tell the story of how my school found my channel while playing Minecraft Bedwars. Not only did my school find it, but other people did too.

Livestream highlights channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/PurpledLIVE
VODS channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/PurpledVODS
Texture pack: https://bit.ly/purpleddefaultpackv1
Twitter: @burpled and @purpled_alt

Current subscriber count: 982,000

Purpled Minecraft Solo Bedwars on Hypixel is HILARIOUS!!! Not really this time though I just had a little story time moment and moved on with things. I am on the Dream SMP and have lore now but that will come later. I literally edited this from about 11am to 7am (20 hours) because I forgot to get it done and decided to subtitle the whole thing and I am also incredibly inefficient at subtitling. This might be the last video I post before reaching 1,000,000 subscribers which is absolutely insane... thank you all for watching!

How EVERYONE Found My Channel

#bedwars #minecraft
blogPost.title: How EVERYONE Found My Channel
blogPost.author: Purpled

localize.title: EVERYONEが私のチャンネルを見つけた方法
localize.description:
Wondershare Filmoraの無料体験版をプレゼント： https://bit.ly/3vxQFDk
#FilmoraFest2021に参加して豪華賞品をゲット： https://bit.ly/33Apw66

今日は、Minecraft Bedwarsをプレイしている時に、学校が私のチャンネルを見つけてくれた話をします。私の学校だけでなく、他の人たちも見つけてくれました。

ライブストリームハイライトチャンネル： https://www.youtube.com/c/PurpledLIVE
VODSチャンネル： https://www.youtube.com/channel/PurpledVODS
テクスチャパック: https://bit.ly/purpleddefaultpackv1
ツイッター バーブルド、パーブルド、アルト

現在のチャンネル登録者数 982,000

HypixelのPurpled Minecraft Solo BedwarsはHILARIOUS!!! 今回は特にありませんが、ちょっとしたストーリータイムがあっただけで、物事を進めました。私はDream SMPに参加していて、今はLoreを持っていますが、それは後になります。私は文字通り午前11時から午前7時まで（20時間）このビデオを編集しました。このビデオは、100万人の登録者を達成する前に投稿する最後のビデオになるかもしれません...見てくれてありがとう

誰もが私のチャンネルを見つけた方法

#ベッドウォーズ #マインクラフト

localize.title: 每个人都是如何找到我的频道的
localize.description:
获得Wondershare Filmora的免费试用：https://bit.ly/3vxQFDk
加入#FilmoraFest2021，赢取丰厚奖品：https://bit.ly/33Apw66

今天我讲述了我的学校如何在玩Minecraft Bedwars时发现我的频道的故事。不仅我的学校发现了它，而且其他人也发现了。

生活流亮点频道：https://www.youtube.com/c/PurpledLIVE
VODS频道: https://www.youtube.com/channel/PurpledVODS
纹理包: https://bit.ly/purpleddefaultpackv1
推特。@burpled和@purpled_alt

目前的订阅者数量。982,000

Purpled Minecraft Solo Bedwars on Hypixel is HILARIOUS!!! 不是真的这个时候，虽然我只是有一个小的故事时间的时刻，并继续前进的事情。我对梦想SMP和现在有传说，但这将是以后. 我从上午11点到早上7点（20个小时）编辑了这个视频，因为我忘了完成它，并决定给整个视频加上字幕，而我在字幕方面的效率也是非常低的。这可能是我在达到100万订阅者之前发布的最后一个视频，这绝对是疯狂的......谢谢大家的观看

每个人都是如何找到我的频道的

#床上战争#minecraft

localize.title: 每個人都是如何找到我的頻道的
localize.description:
獲得Wondershare Filmora的免費試用：https://bit.ly/3vxQFDk
加入#FilmoraFest2021，贏取豐厚獎品：https://bit.ly/33Apw66

今天我講述了我的學校如何在玩Minecraft Bedwars時發現我的頻道的故事。不僅我的學校發現了它，而且其他人也發現了。

生活流亮點頻道：https://www.youtube.com/c/PurpledLIVE
VODS頻道: https://www.youtube.com/channel/PurpledVODS
紋理包: https://bit.ly/purpleddefaultpackv1
推特。@burpled和@purpled_alt

目前的訂閱者數量。982,000

Purpled Minecraft Solo Bedwars on Hypixel is HILARIOUS!!! 不是真的這個時候，雖然我只是有一個小的故事時間的時刻，並繼續前進的事情。我對夢想SMP和現在有傳說，但這將是以後. 我從上午11點到早上7點（20個小時）編輯了這個視頻，因爲我忘了完成它，並決定給整個視頻加上字幕，而我在字幕方面的效率也是非常低的。這可能是我在達到100萬訂閱者之前發佈的最後一個視頻，這絕對是瘋狂的......謝謝大家的觀看

每個人都是如何找到我的頻道的

#牀上戰爭#minecraft
